dropdown.title: Dropdown
dropdown.subtitle: Dropdown menu positioned relative to trigger element with support for various placement options, animations and content customization

basic.title: Basic Example
basic.description: Minimal component configuration with simple options list

placement.title: Placement
placement.description: Dropdown menu placement relative to trigger element: top or bottom, aligned to left, center or right

sameWidth.title: Same Width
sameWidth.description: Dropdown menu automatically matches trigger element width

arrow.title: Arrow
arrow.description: Display pointer arrow directed at trigger element for better visual connection

animation.title: Animations
animation.description: Appearance and disappearance animation variants: smooth opacity change or scaling (zoom)

maxSize.title: Size Constraints
maxSize.description: Limit maximum height or width of dropdown menu with automatic scrolling when size is exceeded

boundaryPadding.title: Edge Padding
boundaryPadding.description: Minimum padding from screen edges when positioning, preventing menu from going outside visible area

offset.title: Trigger Offset
offset.description: Configure distance between trigger element and dropdown menu for better visual separation

template.title: Custom Templates
template.description: Using slots to customize content: header, main content (default) and footer

argTypes.show: Controls dropdown menu visibility. In external control mode used to control open/close state
argTypes.rootEl: Reference to DOM element relative to which dropdown menu is positioned. Required for component to work
argTypes.placement: Dropdown menu position relative to trigger element: top | bottom (default)
argTypes.align: Dropdown menu alignment relative to trigger element: start | center | end. Default: start
argTypes.sameWidth: Automatically sets dropdown menu width equal to trigger element width
argTypes.offset: Distance in pixels between trigger element and dropdown menu. Default: 5. Automatically increases by arrow size if arrow is present
argTypes.boundaryPadding: Minimum padding in pixels from screen edges when positioning. Prevents menu from going outside visible area. Default: 5
argTypes.zIndex: z-index value for dropdown menu. Default: 1000
argTypes.maxHeight: Maximum height of dropdown menu in pixels or CSS units. Scroll appears when exceeded
argTypes.maxWidth: Maximum width of dropdown menu in pixels or CSS units. Content wraps to new line when exceeded
argTypes.teleportTo: CSS selector or DOM element to which dropdown menu is teleported (uses Vue Teleport). Default: "body". Set false to disable teleport
argTypes.restoreFocus: Restore focus on trigger element after closing dropdown menu
argTypes.animation: Type of appearance and disappearance animation: zoom (scaling) | opacity (opacity change, default)
argTypes.arrow: Show pointer arrow directed at trigger element. Automatically increases offset by arrow size
argTypes.hide: Event fired when dropdown menu closes
argTypes.show: Event fired when dropdown menu opens
argTypes.default: Main content of dropdown menu. Displayed between header and footer if they are set
